segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar with a plate in his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised by his cleverness in using the plate to catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's done this before, or if it's his first time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks quite unstable, and I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being quite brave, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what he would do if his mother caught him in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry thinking about him getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he's careful and doesn't make a mess with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being quite mischievous, but I can't help admiring his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he's aware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted thinking about the water making the floor slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
